To the One
Intro: I I/III IV | IV/VI V/VII I
Verse 1: I I/III IV | IV/VI V/VII I x2 new IV/VI I/III | IV/VI V/VII I new I I/III IV | IV/VI V/VII IV
Chorus: IV I | V ii x2
Verse 2: I I/III IV | IV/VI V/VII I x2 new IV/VI I/III | IV/VI V/VII I new IV/VI I/III | IV I
Bridge: IV V vi | vi V/VII I I/III new IV | IV
